thread.section_title: Hotel Morgana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A great place to stay
thread.title_full: A great place to stay - Review of Hotel Morgana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Stuart D
title: A great place to stay
text:
Booked this hotel through British Airways along with the flights 4 nights total Â£303 each.
The hotel is across the road and around the corner from The Termini, so getting to and from the airport is easy by train 14 Euros each single.
The room was very nice and the bed was very comfortable. Only drawback was no tea or coffee in the room. This was an extra cost if you wanted it. The breakfast was good and the coffee served was spot on. The staff were very helpful and would help with directions. The location is good if you like walking, The Collosium is about 20mins. To get further afield the Metro and Busses run from The termini. Would stay here again.
Room Tip: The lifts are a bit small, but the stairs are hard work if you are on floor 4 or 5 See more room tips
